def_en: If one thing overlaps another, or if you overlap them, a part of the first thing occupies the same area as a part of the other thing. You can also say that two things overlap .

def_cn: （在主题、人物、时间等上）（与…）部分相同，（与…）部分交叉
def_en: If one idea or activity overlaps another, or overlaps with another, they involve some of the same subjects, people, or periods of time.
